name: Pond Melter
description:
OBJECTIVE:

Move your flame character to melt as much of the pond as possible without falling in.  Watch out for falling snowballs!

CONTROLS:

W/A/S/D or Arrow KeysMoveSpacebarJump

CREDITS:

Game created by alf0186 for the OGA Winter Game Jam 2022.

The following work was used in the creation of this game.  Modifications were made.
